text: Reporting live! Chrissy Teigen made good on her word that she ’ d be hosting President Donald Trump ’ s “ Most Dishonest & Corrupt Media Awards of the Year. ” The 31 - year - old model took to Snapchat on Wednesday, January 18, to document the mock event. “ Just arrived here at the Dolby Theater in Hollywood, ” Teigen narrated a hilarious clip of herself walking around the lobby. “ The Fake News Media Awards are setting up now. ” Teigen then panned the camera around the main floor of the theater, where many people were walking around. “ Here at the Dolby Theater for the MDCMAs, the ‘ Most Dishonest and Corrupt Media Awards. ’ As you can see, it
